long_name: The Anckar-Fredriksson dataset of political regimes
notes: The democracy measure should be equivalent to democracy_omitteddata from bmr up to 2010; it may have some divergences for the 2011-2016 period.

long_name: The Acemoglu, Naidu, Restrepo, and Robinson dataset
notes: The measure can be extended by using the latest FH, Polity, and PACL Data, but the rules are not entirely transparent, and some cases in the original dataset have been hand-coded.

long_name: The Arat measure of democracy
notes: Only available via the Pemstein, Meserve, and Melton (2013) replication data. I have not been able to access the original data.

long_name: The Bowman, Lehoucq, and Mahoney index of democracy for Central America
The Boix-Miller-Rosato dichotomous coding of democracy, 1800-2015, version 4.0
The Bernhard, Nordstrom & Reenock Event History Coding of Democratic Breakdowns
notes: Can be extended using a full panel of sovereign countries  (COW). Extended version included in this package.

long_name: The Berteslmann Index of Political transformation
The Bollen measure of democracy
notes: The original data was compiled in 1978, for Bollen's dissertation; existing data seems to be from the 2000 update. I do not know how much it changed over time. Only available via the Pemstein, Meserve, and Melton (2013) replication data. I have not been able to access the original data.

long_name: Renske Doorenspleet's Democracy Dataset
The Economist Intelligence Unit's Democracy Index
notes: The original data has to be manually extracted from the tables in the EIU's pdf report on the index.

long_name: Freedom House "Freedom in the World" data
Freedom House "Freedom in the World" data
notes: This is the 0-100 score Freedom House uses for its more aggregated ratings. Freedom House changed its methodology in 2013, so the full data is different for this period; full data from 2003-2012 is available in their website, but is not yet included in this package.

long_name: Freedom House "Electoral Democracies" List
notes: The electoral democracy list seems to have only been compiled since the 1990s, but I have not been able to find an exact date of first compilation.

long_name: The Geddes Wright and Frantz Autocratic Regimes dataset
notes: Can be extended using the gwf_duration variable. Extended version included in this package.

long_name: Axel Hadenius' Index of Democracy
notes: Only available via the Pemstein, Meserve, and Melton (2013) replication data. I have not been able to access the original data.

long_name: The Steffen Kailitz Dataset of Authoritarian Regime Types
The Lexical Index of Electoral Democracy, v. 3
Autocracies of the World, 1950-2012 (Version 1.0).
notes: Can be extended using the duration_nr variable. Extended version included in this package.

long_name: Mainwaring, Brinks, and Perez Linan's democracy measure for Latin America
Munck Index of Democracy
notes: Only available via the Pemstein, Meserve, and Melton (2013) replication data. I have not been able to access the original data.

long_name: The Democracy and Dictatorship Dataset (DD/PACL/ACLP/CGV)
notes: The original data was first compiled, as far as I know, for the famous ACLP study "Modernization: Theories and Facts" study of 1996. It was extended and changed by Cheibub, Gandhi, and Vreeland in 2010 (pacl dataset) and further updated by  Bjornskov and Rode (2020; pacl_update dataset), who added new institutional variables.

long_name: Participation-Enhanced Polity Score
The Political Institutions and Political Events (PIPE) dataset
notes: Democracy measures in PIPE are calculated in this package on the basis of imperfect instructions in the codebook.  Use with care.

long_name: Political Instability Task Force democracy indicator
notes: Constructed score on the basis of Polity data.

long_name: Political Instability Task Force democracy indicator
notes: Constructed score on the basis of Polity data.

long_name: The Polity IV dataset
notes: The first compilation of this dataset (POLITY I) was probably first used in a 1975 study by Eckstein and Gurr, but had been collected by Gurr since the late 1960s. The current form of the data is very different from the original Polity I data. The Polity II codebook survives, but I find no record of the Polity I codebook.

long_name: The Polity5 dataset
notes: The first compilation of this dataset (POLITY I) was probably first used in a 1975 study by Eckstein and Gurr, but had been collected by Gurr since the late 1960s. The current form of the data is very different from the original Polity I data. The Polity II codebook survives, but I find no record of the Polity I codebook.

long_name: The Polyarchy Scale and the Contestation Scale
Latent Dimensions of Contestation and Inclusiveness by Michael Coppedge, Angel Alvarez, and Claudia Maldonado
The Political Regime Change (PRC) dataset.
The Rulers, Elections, and Irregular Governance (REIGN) dataset, regime characteristics worksheet.
notes: Archived here now, since collection has stopped.

long_name: Suport Vector Machine Democracy Index by Grundler and Krieger
Suport Vector Machine Democracy Index by Grundler and Krieger
Milan Svolik's Regime Dataset
The Unified Democracy Scores
notes: Can be extended using the methods described in this package's "Replicating and Extending the UD scores of Pemstein, Meserve, and Melton" article (https://xmarquez.github.io/democracyData/articles/articles/Replicating_and_extending_the_UD_scores.html)

long_name: The Democracy/Autocracy Dataset by Jay Ulfelder
notes: Can be extended using the rgjdurd and rgjdura variables. Extended version included in this package.

long_name: The University of Texas Inequality Project Categorical Dataset of Political Regimes
notes: Both the dichotomous and trichotomous versions of these measures are calculated by this package. The original dataset distinguishes several different types of democracy.

long_name: The University of Texas Inequality Project Categorical Dataset of Political Regimes
notes: Both the dichotomous and trichotomous versions of these measures are calculated by this package. The original dataset distinguishes several different types of democracy.

long_name: Vanhanen measures of democracy, 1800-2018
notes: Vanhanen first collected democracy data on 12 countries for his 1968 dissertation. Current data is different from the original data, though it still uses a similar conceptual scheme.

long_name: The Varieties of Democracy Dataset, version 12
notes: The full dataset be accessed using the package vdemdata. (Use "remotes::install_github("vdeminstitute/vdemdata")"; the package is not on CRAN)

long_name: Authoritarian Regimes Data Set, version 5.0, by Axel Hadenius, Jan Teorell, & Michael Wahman
The World Governance Indicators "Voice and Accountability" Index
